title: High ping North West UK?
body:
Title. All of my NW UK friends went from 30-70 ping up to 100-160 ping.

Anyone else similar issue?

replies.body:
Your High Ping could be an issue involving a bad connection between the Client and the Server. Let's go ahead and have you run through our [Connection Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)and it's steps. This should stabilize that Ping and allow you to enjoy the game, if not though let me know. 

{{champion:25}}
